messages.message:
When I add a custom field I’m able to update the prompt and that updates the value too, but the “Field Name” stays the same.
This was on aihub.dev (http://aihub.dev)
I think we only rename the field if it was empty, so if you started with blank field name and used complex prompt, we’ll generate the new field name
I never edited the Field Name, it autopopulated it, but then failed to update after I changed the prompt.
yeah this behavior is expected right now, we only update the field name the first time. Once there is a value in that input box we don’t rename
@lydia maybe something quick to fix with the 23.08 work?

I’d argue I don’t want the field name to change after it has been set. Usually it’s set once automatically and then after that point in refining the prompt to extract the data i wanted when the field name was set. 

If I want to get different data out(which requires a new name to be generated) I’d create a new field.
yeah this was a specific decision we made for the reason @Lee mentioned.
